name: Handmade African Necklace, Pink Necklace, One of a Kind, by Hieropice
description: Pink and Gold Beaded African Jewellery, One of a Kind, by Hieropice For a bold statement, this one of a kind beaded pendant necklace is just the thing! Hand-beaded by Hieropice's artist, Dara, in the style of the Maasai tribe of East Africa, fuchsia and magenta glass beads are accented with silver and gold for a truly memorable piece. The only one in existence, you will receive the pendant shown. Pendant measures approximately 4.5 cms across, and is hung on 24-inch gold-plated chain. - Chain can be modified to custom length, just ask! View our other one-of-a-kind pieces in our One of a Kind section

name: Glass Terrarium Necklace, Terrarium Pendant Necklace
description: Blue Flower Glass Terrarium Necklace by Hieropice Inspired by the world a small woodland lymph might reside in, this glass terrarium necklace includes a miniature robin's egg blue bloom and marshland reeds handcrafted by Dara Cheek, emerging from a landscape of pale blue pebbles. Fronds of reindeer and cushion moss surround the landscape, and the scene is enclosed within a teardrop-shaped glass vial measuring 3 centimeters from top of cap to tip of vial. The pendant is hung from 20-inch Sterling silver chain, and arrives in a ribboned gift box. - This pendant requires no water, sun, or air; it's maintenance-free! - Can be hung on the chain-length of your choice, just ask! - Pendant will stay as-is when worn, contents are secured and won't shift Customers have said: "Exquisitely beautiful! I love Hieropice's unique jewelry and amazing work! Looking forward to ordering again! This necklace is in-stock, and ready to ship! Interested in our other terrarium necklaces? View our Terrarium Necklace Collection.

name: Handmade Blue and Gold Beaded Earrings, African Tribal Jewelry
description: Cobalt Blue Handmade Beaded Earrings by Hieropice The Maasai tribe of Eastern Africa specializes in beautiful beadwork. These earrings incorporate a modern take on a traditional Maasai beading technique created by artist Dara Cheek, with a contemporary, glamorous twist. Rich cobalt blue faceted rondelles and 24 karat gold Miyuki beads in alternating beaded rows in an elegant floral shape make for a striking pair! Perfect for the woman who likes to make a statement with her jewelry. Earrings measure approximately 4 centimeters across. Hoping to give these as a birthday or holiday gift, or wear them to an event? Let us know when you order, as we may have them in-stock. Hieropice's items are typically made-to-order and require 4-12 days to create by-hand. See Hieropice's other beaded earrings in our Maasai Earrings Section.

name: Ecosphere Necklace, Springtime Pendant Necklace, by Hieropice
description: Miniature Springtime Ecosystem Necklace, by Hieropice Celebrate Spring, all year! Within this tiny glass bulb (measures only 1 inch, from top of vial cap to base of vial!) are a hand-sculpted polymer crocus, green sprout and red-capped mushroom, nestled in a bed of green "Earth," encircled by sprigs of soft reindeer moss. All of this miniature ecosphere's components were hand-crafted by artist Dara Cheek, and this beautiful pendant comes on a 20-inch Sterling silver chain. - Pendant's components are secured, won't move or shift (no matter how much you shake it!) - Available on a custom-length chain, just ask! - No maintenance required; no sun, water, or air! This necklace was featured on the handmade jewelry blog JewelryRevelations.com, read it at Jewelry Revelations. Hieropice's Ecosphere Necklace may be in-stock at the time of your order, but please inquire prior to ordering if you'd like to receive it by a specific date, as Hieropice's items are generally made-to-order and take between 4 and 12 days (during holidays) for production. View our whole collection of handmade Terrarium Necklaces in our Terrarium Necklace section.

name: Black and White Necklace, Modern Jewelry
description: African Beaded Black and White Necklace, by Hieropice Black and white are meant to be paired, each making the other more vivid. Created by Dara Cheek after spending a month in Tanzania volunteering, this pendant was modeled after traditional Maasai beadwork. The pendant measures approximately 4.5 centimeters in diameter, and is hung on a 20-inch silver-plated chain (Sterling silver available upon request). - Contact Hieropice regarding customization requests, like chain-length. Customers have said: "I have been purchasing amazing and exquisite pieces from Hieropice and have been thrilled every time I have the privilege of purchasing from them! This piece is so striking and lovely!" Let us know if you hope to receive this necklace by a specific date, as we may have it in stock, though Hieropice's items are usually made-to-order (as soon as you order them, we get to work!) and take between 4 and 12 days to create by hand.

name: Nature Necklace - Lost World Terrarium Necklace
description: Your very own mini eco-system, in jewelry-form! The Lost World Terrarium Necklace, by Hieropice, features an itty bitty polymer clay mushroom, hand-sculpted by Hieropice's artist/designer Dara, planted in a bed of sparkling black "soil," and surrounded by reindeer moss and fern moss. Customizable, you can request a version sans-moss or mushroom, or with other customizations, just ask! Heartdrop pendant measures ~1.5 inches, from top of cap to tip of glass vial, and is hung from a 20-inch Sterling silver chain. - These pendants never perish, and require no maintenance (no sun, no water, no air) - Available on a custom-length chain, just ask! - Pendant will retain its composition, regardless of jostling, shaking, etc. All components inside are secured! Customers have said: "Perfect; came in an adorable decorative box & shipped with care. The necklace it's self is gorgeous - almost wish I purchased it for myself and not a gift ;)" Read about how these are made on the Hieropice blog This necklace was featured on Madalynne.com This item may be in-stock at the time of your order, but please inquire prior to ordering if you'd like to receive an item by a specific date, as Hieropice's items are generally made-to-order and take between 4 and 12 days (during holidays) for production. View Hieropice's other Terrarium Necklaces in the Terrarium Necklaces section.

name: Yellow and Gold Maasai Beaded Earrings, African Jewellery
description: Created using a twist on a traditional Maasai tribe (East African) beading technique, artist Dara Cheek combines rich golds, silver and amber tones in glass and metal in a glamorous take on African jewellery. Hand-beaded, the earrings measure 4 centimeters in diameter. Let us know if you hope to receive these by a certain date, as Hieropice's items are handmade to-order and take 3-12 days for production, but may already be in-stock at the time of your order. View Hieropice's whole Maasai beaded earring collection.

name: Christmas Gift for the Gardener, Mini Garden Under Glass
description: Miniature Garden Necklace for the Gardener, by Hieropice Know someone obsessed with all things nature? This necklace makes the perfect gift, and was created just in time for Christmas! A vibrant tableau of yellow blossom, live moss, orange lichen, and Spring green sprout, planted in rich Earth. All on a miniature scale, in a glass vial measuring 2.5 centimeters in height. The pendant is hung on a Sterling silver chain measuring 20 inches. Even if it's getting frosty where you are, you can take the beauty of Spring with you all Winter long! - I can hang this pendant on a chain-length of your choice, just ask - Pendant's contents would shift or shuffle when worn - Pendant requires no maintenance, moss is preserved Let me know if you hope to receive this necklace for a specific date or gift-giving, as I may have it in-stock at the time of your order. Hieropice's handmade items are generally made-to-order, and take between 4 and 12 days to create. Love the idea, but the style's not for you? See Hieropice's whole fabulous Terrarium Necklace collection.

name: Beaded Necklace, in Teal and Gold
description: A contemporary take on a traditional Maasai tribe (East Africa) beading technique, this beaded necklace was intricately hand-beaded by Hieropice's artist, Dara Cheek, in graduated ocean tones accented with gold. Hung on a 20-inch gold-plated Singapore chain, pendant measures approximately 5.5 cms across. - Available on custom-length chain, just ask! Customers who have purchased this piece have said: "Beautiful piece, receive many compliments on it. Very fast shipping, too!" Hieropice's items are generally made-to-order, but we may already have this item in-stock, so please inquire prior to ordering if you require an item by a specific date to determine if we can accommodate you. View our collection of Maasai beaded necklaces.

name: African Earings in Teal and Gold, Maasai Beaded Earrings
description: Teal Maasai Beaded Earrings by Hieropice Hand-beaded with a traditional Maasai tribe beading technique, these earrings feature an elegant scalloped shape, and contrasting teal and gold beads. While the technique is traditional African, these earrings are contemporary, with just enough sparkle to amp up any outfit. Earrings measure approximately 3.5 centimeters in diameter. Customers have said: "I adore these! Love the blues and greens. Have gotten so many compliments!" View Hieropice's other Maasai beaded earrings These earrings may be in-stock at the time of your order, but please notify us if you hope to receive them by a specific date, as our items are typically made-to-order and take between 1 and 12 days for production.

name: Garnet Earrings with Gold and Silver, Handmade Red Earrings
description: Handmade Garnet Earrings by Hieropice Sparkling, faceted garnets from India, woven with Sterling silver and gold in a new take on traditional Maasai beadwork. Handmade, these earrings measure 4 centimeters across. Hieropice has a gorgeous garnet and gold Maasai beaded necklace to match, in our Maasai Necklaces section. See our whole Maasai Necklace Collection for other styles. These earrings are handmade, and require between 4 and 12 days to make, but we may have them in-stock when you order, so let us know if you'd like them by a specific date!

name: Peacock Feather Earrings, Maasai Beadwork
description: Maasai Beadwork Peacock Feather Earrings, by Hieropice There is something intriguing about a peacock feather. Inspecting one closely, its colors are subtly nuanced. These earrings were inspired by those beautifully nuanced colors, and represent a peacock feather through the intricate beadwork technique of the Maasai tribe of East Africa. Created by artist Dara Cheek, these earrings measure 4.5 centimeters in diameter, and hang lightly on the ear. Customers have said: "I am speechless. These are the most gorgeous things I've ever seen. Sooo much more amazing in person!" We may have these in-stock at the time of your purchase, but let us know if you hope to receive them by a specific date, as our items are handmade and require 4-12 days to create.

name: Purple Blossom Nature Necklace, Purple Pendant Necklace
description: Miniature Purple Nature Necklace, by Hieropice Purple is the rich hue of royalty and passion, and this piece was inspired by the most desired color of friends and family reviewing their jewelry collections. In a teardrop-shaped glass vial measuring about 1.5 inches tall is a handmade purple (or magenta, if you like) polymer clay blossom, planted in a deep purple, sparkling landscape. A swath of chartreuse moss is draped around the blossom, all is enclosed, and the glass pendant is hung from a 20-inch-long Sterling silver chain. Necklace arrives in a gift box, ready to be gifted to someone you love and admire! - Pendant will remain as-is, its contents won't shift and are secured - Pendant requires no maintenance (sun, water, air) - Pendant can be hung on a chain-length of your choosing, just ask! While Hieropice's items are generally made-to-order, this necklace might be in-stock at the time of your order, so please let us know if you hope to receive it by a specific date, for gift-giving or special event. Hieropice's items are typically made-to-order, and require 4-12 days to make. Want to see our other nature necklaces? Check out our Terrarium Necklace Collection.

name: Ecosystem Necklace, Orange Glass Necklace
description: Orange Flower Ecosystem Necklace, by Hieropice You should wear more orange. What's not to like about the fiery, rich, energizing color?! Hieropice's orange Ecosystem Necklace (or call it a vivarium, or terranium, whatever you prefer!) features a small orange blossom (just 4 millimeters wide!) and leafy green sprout sculpted by hand from polymer clay, planted in a bed of orange Earth with fronds of Spring green moss. The tableau is encased in a glass vial that measures just 1.5 inches from top of the cap to the bottom of the vial, and is hung on a 20-inch Sterling silver chain. A perfect late Summer-early Autumn scene, in miniature. - Can be made with a chain-length of your choice, just inquire - Requires no maintenance; no sun, water, or air needed! - Contents of vial are secured, won't topple over or shift when worn As seen in the Somerville Beat! We may have this necklace in-stock when you order, but please inquire if you hope to receive it by a specific date, as it takes between 4 and 12 days to create and our items are generally made-to-order. Want to see Hieropice's other terrarium necklaces? Check out our Terrarium Necklace Collection.

name: Winter Necklace on Sterling Silver Chain, Terrarium Pendant
description: Sterling Silver Chain Necklace with Terrarium Pendant, by Hieropice While Hieropice does love color, the wintry landscape of the Northeast United States inspired this elegant white terrarium necklace. It's a celebration of Winter, featuring a snowy tundra, precious blush flower sculpted by hand from polymer clay, and sprig of wild-harvested lichen, all composed in a heart-shaped glass vial by artist, Dara Cheek. The pendant measures approximately 1.5 inches from cap to tip, and is hung on a 20-inch Sterling silver chain. Each pendant is handmade and uniquely-composed. - Contents of pendant are secured, won't shift when worn - Available on custom-length chain, please inquire - Requires no maintenance; no sun, water, or air needed Customers have said: "Order came so quickly! Thank You! My mom loved the necklace. In fact, looking at one of your mushroom terrarium necklaces for myself now! Will definitely be doing business with you again! Thank you again." View Hieropice's entire collection of Terrarium Necklaces.

name: Miniature Desert Necklace, Southwest Necklace
description: Miniature Southwest Necklace, by Hieropice A customer requested a more masculine terrarium necklace, one that paid homage to the Sonoran Desert of the Southwest. Thus, Hieropice's Miniature Desert Necklace was born. It includes a tiny polymer clay cactus, green succulent plant, and brown-capped mushroom crafted by hand by artist Dara Cheek, all planted in a sandy bed strewn with lichen "tumbleweeds," enclosed in a bulb-shaped glass vial measuring just 1 inch tall. The pendant is hung on a 20-inch-long leather thong. Makes a great gift for a guy in your life! - Cord can be a length of your choice, just ask! - Components inside pendant are secured and won't topple or shift - Pendant requires no maintenance; no sun, air, or water! Customers have said: "What a cool, custom made (I asked her to do a desert terrarium), and, with the rawhide cord in lieu of a silver chain, masculine piece of jewelry. Thanks Dara C. I tell everybody whos fascinated by it that you can get one at Hieropice!" Let us know if you hope to have this necklace by a specific date (for special event or gifting) as we may have it in-stock, though Hieropice's items are typically made-to-order and require 4-12 days for their creation. We have many other terrarium necklace styles, view them in our Terrarium Necklace Section.

name: Microgreens Miniature World Necklace, Green Pendant Necklace
description: Green Miniature World Necklace by Hieropice "Microgreens" is a cheeky ode to all things verdant and itty-bitty, and was inspired by a custom request from a fan. A tiny green-capped hand-sculpted polymer clay mushroom in lime green Earth, framed by sprigs of reindeer moss and cushion moss, encapsulated in a heartdrop-shaped glass vial that measures less than an inch tall. The glass pendant is hung on a 20-inch Sterling silver chain. Enchanting as any Irish hillside, this necklace allows you to carry the natural world with you, wherever you may travel. - Pendant will maintain its beauty forever, requires no maintenance - Pendant's contents are secured, won't topple - Available on a chain-length of your choice, just ask! Let us know if you hope to receive this necklace by a specific date for gift-giving or special event, as we may have it in-stock at the time of your order. Unless otherwise specified, Hieropice's items are made-to-order and require 4-12 days for production. Check out our many other Terrarium Necklace styles in our Terrarium Necklace Section.

name: Yellow Miniature Garden Pendant Necklace, Terrarium Necklace
description: Yellow Pendant on Chain Necklace by Hieropice Hand-crafted by Hieropice's artist, Dara Cheek, this miniature pendant (measures just 3 cm tall from top of cap to tip of glass vial!) is an entire sun-filled garden, under glass. Featuring a miniature yellow blossom and green Springtime sprout sculpted by-hand from polymer clay, a bed of yellow Earth and sprigs of chartreuse moss. - Requires no water, sun, or air. Just be gentle, it's glass! - All components inside pendant are secured, won't fall or shift - Pendant can be hung on a chain of your specified length, just ask View Hieropice's entire Terrarium Necklace collection This necklace may be in-stock at the time of your order, but please inquire prior to ordering if you hope to receive it by a specific date, as Hieropice's items are typically made-to-order and take between 4 and 12 days for their creation.

name: Garnet Necklace, Maasai Beadwork Necklace
description: Maasai Beaded Garnet Necklace, by Hieropice Luscious, deep red garnets encircle an intricate beadwork pattern created with a traditional Maasai tribe (East Africa) beading technique by artist Dara Cheek. The pendant features Sterling silver bars and gold beads, with glass rocailles and garnet shards. It measures 4.5 centimeters across and is hung on 22-inch silver chain. - Can be hung on a chain-length of your choice, just ask! Customers have said: "This necklace has such a lovely striking color and shine! Beautiful!" We may have a finished version of this necklace in-stock at the time of your order, but please inquire prior to ordering if you hope to receive it by a specific date as our items are generally made-to-order and take between 4 and 12 days to create. name: White Wedding Necklace, Winter Landscape
description: Winter Landscape Necklace by Hieropice A miniature, pearly landscape within a glass vial measuring approximately 2.5 centimeters from cap to base, hung from a 20-inch Sterling silver chain. A swath of white, a white stone, a little hand-formed clay blossom, and sprig of lichen, this pendant's tableau is perfect for a bride, or a loved-one's birthday. Each pendant is unique, and exquisite. - Requires no water, sun, or air, it's maintenance-free! - Available on a custom chain-length, just ask - Pendant's contents are secured in place, won't shift Customers have said: "Lovely necklace. Excellent service." Love the composition, but prefer a different shape? See the "heartdrop" version of this pendant necklace. Please let us know if you hope to receive this item by a specific date, as it may be in-stock. Hieropice's handmade pieces are generally made-to-order, and take between 4 and 12 days for their creation. See our other amazing miniature landscapes in our Terrarium Necklace Section.

name: Black Chevron Necklace, Hematite Chain Necklace
description: Hematite Chevron Necklace, by Hieropice Hematite has a mercurial black sheen that is striking when worn. In this silver chain necklace, hematite chevrons are aligned with silver beads for a simple, modern look that complements any ensemble. The pendant is hung on a 20-inch silver chain, and makes a wonderful gift! - Available on a chain-length of your choice, just ask! We may have this necklace in-stock at the time of your order, but please contact us if you hope to receive it by a specific date, as Hieropice's items are generally made-to-order and take between 4 and 12 days to create. name: Hematite Chevron Earrings, Contemporary Jewelry
description: Black Chevron Earrings by Hieropice There is just something special about the chevron. And in hematite, an iridescent black semiprecious stone, they are truly eye-catching. Hung on 3-inch long sterling silver chain, the chevrons make for a versatile pair of dangle earrings that go with everything. Customers have said, about these earrings: "Favorite earrings EVER! So simple and classic, beautifully made. Super fast shipping as always!!" Check out our matching hematite chevron necklace, in our Necklaces section. See our other earrings, in our Earrings section. This necklace may be in-stock at the time of your order, but please let us know if you're hoping to receive it by a specific date, as our items are typically made-to-order, and require between 4 and 12 days to make.

name: Pink Heart Necklace for Charity, Susan G. Komen Necklace
description: Necklace for Susan G. Komen Foundation by Hieropice Created to fundraise for a friend participating in the Susan G. Komen Foundation 3-Day, this necklace is now a Hieropice staple. With 20% of the proceeds of each sale of this necklace going toward breast cancer research at the Komen Foundation, the pendant features the Foundation's signature pink, in a miniature polymer clay mushroom planted in pink "soil." Handmade, the pendant measures approximately 1.5 inches from silver cap to tip of glass vial and is hung on a 20-inch Sterling silver chain. - Non-perishable, pendant requires no sun, water, or air - Available on custom-length chain, just inquire - Pendant's contents are secured to prevent shifting when worn - 20% of proceeds go to the Komen Foundation, more information available on their website This necklace was featured in the Crafting Women Worldwide blog, read about it at Crafting Women Worldwide Hieropice's pieces are generally made-to-order and require 1-12 days for production, so please inquire prior to purchase if you required an item by a specific date, as we may already have it in-stock. See Hieropice's other terrarium necklaces in our Terrarium Necklace section

name: Moss Terrarium on Chain Necklace, Cute Jewelry
description: We love cute jewelry at Hieropice. This necklace features an itty-bitty pink spotted mushroom and little green sprouts, planted in a lush green landscape with sprigs off moss, encapuslated in a heart-shaped glass vial measuring approximately 1.5 inches tall. All hand-crafted by artist Dara Cheek, this pendant is hung on a 20-ince Sterling silver chain. - Pendant's contents won't shift or topple, all pieces are secured - Requires no maintenance; no sun, water, or air. Will stay pretty forever! - Pendant can be hung on a custom-length chain, just ask! Hieropice's items are generally handmade-to-order, so please inquire in-advance if you hope to receive an item by a specific date, as production time is 3-12 days.
